getAccount

public java.lang.String getAccount(OrderLine e)
Retrieves an account number. Customer accounts (it is a Client account and some invoice was generated from this orderline) are represented by the payer id prefixed by the character 'C'.

Specified by:
getAccount in interface AccountExportService

getInvoiceNumber

public java.lang.String getInvoiceNumber(OrderLine e)
Retrieves the document number. Invoice number is substituted to document number when an orderline references an account of class 4.
